column5: I am thinking of fishing Cedar one day at the end of July for some crappies. Any intel on boat landing and if they are biting? Thanks! WishinFishin
It's hard to tell if there biting it's not the end of July,things sometimes changes from week to week with fishing.
They have a tendency to sorta disappear after the spawn, some seem to locate on thick weeds, others to the middle of the lake. Look for them on your depth finder. Bill

To try and help you with your question about a boat landing, I checked out Ontario Fish Online:https://www.lioapplications.lrc.gov....ine.FishONLine It shows a landing just off of 105, immediately north of the Camp Robinson Rd. I recall checking it out years ago, but my recollection is fuzzy - perhaps others can weigh in?
The boat boat ramp off 105 is good. I have camped at Cliff Lake campgrounds and used this ramp.
